text: Zee Marathi is an Indian general entertainment channel which carries programming in Marathi. The channel was launched on 15 August 1999 and was known as Alpha TV Marathi until 27 March 2005, then it was renamed as Zee Marathi. It is the first Marathi GEC channel. A HD version of this channel, Zee Marathi HD, was launched on 20 November 2016. == Current broadcast == ===Fiction series=== Premiere date Series Adaptation of 13 March 2023 Tula Shikvin Changlach Dhada 7 July 2024 Lakhat Ek Aamcha Dada Tamil TV series Anna 23 September 2024 Savalyachi Janu Savali Bengali TV series Krishnakoli 12 February 2024 Paaru Telugu TV series Muddha Mandaram 23 December 2024 Lakshmi Niwas Kannada TV series Lakshmi Nivasa 12 February 2024 Shiva Odia TV series Sindura Bindu 17 February 2025 Tula Japnar Aahe Kannada TV series Na Ninna Bidalaare 18 March 2024 Navri Mile Hitlerla Hindi TV series Guddan Tumse Na Ho Payega Devmanus – Madhala Adhyay Ichhadhari Naagin Hindi TV series Naaginn – Waadon Ki Agnipariksha ===Non-fiction shows=== Premiere date Show 8 June 2020 Vedh Bhavishyacha 15 March 2025 Chal Bhava Citit == Former broadcast == ===Drama series=== #
